DOC.brief_title: Unknown Glucose Metabolism Disorders In Patients With Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Context : There 220 million people diagnosed diabetes mellitus ( DM ) world . DM serious risk factor coronary artery disease ( CAD ) . This study aim examine prevalence glucose metabolism disorder ( GMD ) te patient coronary artery disease relationship different GMDs CAD . Settings : 230 patient coronary artery disease without know GMDs include study . Coronary angiography use diagnose CAD . Patients administer 75 g Oral Glucose Tolerance Test ( OGTT ) .
DOC.criteria: Patients coronary artery disease glucose metabolism disorder include study . Patients previous GMDs , malignancy , chronic liver kidney disease , rheumatologic disorder , BMI high 35 kg/m2 exclude study .
